rules.comment: a statistical app which tries to predict the american presidential election

phrases.expression: Who will win the 2016 presidential election
Who will (?:be|become) the next us president

process.expression: SELECT PERCENT(count) AS percent, hashtag AS president FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, hashtags AS hashtag FROM messages WHERE query='election2016' GROUP BY hashtags) WHERE hashtag IN ('hillaryclinton','berniesanders','donaldtrump');

phrases: I believe the next president will be $president$ with a likelihood of $percent$ percent but I a not sure.
I can calculate a likelihood, here is my guess:

phrases.expression: Who tweeted most about * in the last hour

process.expression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, screen_name FROM messages-group-by-screen_name WHERE query='$1$ since:hour';

phrases: In the last hour @$screen_name$ tweeted most about $1$, $count$ times

rules.example: who tweeted most about obama in the last day

phrases.expression: Who tweeted most about * in the last day

process.expression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, screen_name FROM messages-group-by-screen_name WHERE query='$1$ since:day';

phrases: In the last 24 hours @$screen_name$ tweeted most about $1$, $count$ times

phrases.expression: Who tweeted most about * in the last week

process.expression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, screen_name FROM messages-group-by-screen_name WHERE query='$1$ since:week';

phrases: In the last week @$screen_name$ tweeted most about $1$, $count$ times

process.expression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, screen_name FROM messages-group-by-screen_name WHERE query='$2$';

phrases: @$screen_name$ tweeted most about $2$, $count$ times

phrases.expression: How many times was * tweeted in the last 24 hours

process.expression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM messages WHERE query='$1$ since:day';

phrases: Here you go, $1$ was $count$ times tweeted!

rules.example: How many mentions are on reddit about loklak

phrases.expression: How many mentions are on reddit about *

process.expression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM rss WHERE url='https://www.reddit.com/search.rss?q=$1$';

phrases: Here you go, $1$ was $count$ times mentioned on reddit!

rules.example: What are the reddit articles about loklak

process.expression: SELECT title FROM rss WHERE url='https://www.reddit.com/search.rss?q=$3$';

phrases: Here is the list of articles about $3$

rules.example: What is the primary reddit article about loklak

process.expression: SELECT title FROM rss WHERE url='https://www.reddit.com/search.rss?q=$3$';
first

phrases: The primary reddit article about $3$ is $title$

rules.example: Read the RSS feed from https://news.ycombinator.com/rss

process.expression: SELECT title FROM rss WHERE url='$4$';

phrases: Here is the list of articles from $4$

rules.example: How many tweets did melaniatrump post in May 2016

phrases.expression: * tweets did * post in the month of *

process.expression: SELECT yearwise[$3$] AS count FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$2$' AND count='1000';

phrases: $2$ tweeted $count$ times in $3$

rules.example: How many tweets did melaniatrump post at 6 PM

process.expression: SELECT hourwise[$3$] AS count FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$2$' AND count='1000';

phrases: $2$ tweeted $count$ times at $3$

rules.example: How many tweets did melaniatrump post on Saturdays

process.expression: SELECT daywise[$3$] AS count FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$2$' AND count='1000';

phrases: $2$ tweeted $count$ times on $3$

rules.example: Show me the yearwise tweet frequency chart of melaniatrump

process.expression: SELECT $2$ FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$3$' AND count='1000';

phrases: This is the $2$ frequency chart of $3$

rules.example: How many times did melaniatrump post a video

process.expression: SELECT $3$ AS count FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$2$' AND count='1000';

phrases: $2$ posted a $3$ $count$ times

rules.example: How many likes does melaniatrump have in all

process.expression: SELECT likes_count AS count FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$2$' AND count='1000';

phrases: $2$ has $count$ likes till now

rules.example: What is the maximum number of likes that melaniatrump got

process.expression: SELECT max_likes FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$3$' AND count='1000';

phrases: Here you go

rules.example: What is the average number of likes that melaniatrump gets

process.expression: SELECT average_number_of_likes AS count FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$3$' AND count='1000';

phrases: $3$ gets $count$ likes on an average

rules.example: How many times did melaniatrump get 0 likes

process.expression: SELECT likes_chart[$3$] AS count FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$2$' AND count='1000';

phrases: $2$ got $3$ likes, $count$ times

rules.example: Show me the likes frequency chart of melaniatrump

process.expression: SELECT likes_chart FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$3$' AND count='1000';

phrases: Here is the likes frequency chart

rules.example: How many retweets does melaniatrump have in all

process.expression: SELECT retweets_count AS count FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$2$' AND count='1000';

phrases: $2$ has $count$ retweets till now

rules.example: What is the maximum number of retweets that melaniatrump got

process.expression: SELECT max_retweets FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$3$' AND count='1000';

phrases: Here you go

rules.example: What is the average number of retweets that melaniatrump gets

process.expression: SELECT average_number_of_retweets AS count FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$3$' AND count='1000';

phrases: $3$ gets $count$ retweets on an average

rules.example: How many times did melaniatrump get 0 retweets

process.expression: SELECT retweets_chart[$3$] AS count FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$2$' AND count='1000';

phrases: $2$ got $3$ retweets, $count$ times

rules.example: Show me the retweet frequency chart of melaniatrump

process.expression: SELECT retweets_chart FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$3$' AND count='1000';

phrases: Here is the retweets frequency chart

rules.example: How many hashtags has melaniatrump used in all

process.expression: SELECT hashtags_used_count AS count FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$2$' AND count='1000';

phrases: $2$ has used $count$ hashtags till now

rules.example: What is the maximum number of hastags that melaniatrump used

process.expression: SELECT max_hashtags FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$3$' AND count='1000';

phrases: Here you go

rules.example: What is the average number of hashtags that melaniatrump uses

process.expression: SELECT average_number_of_hashtags_used AS count FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$3$' AND count='1000';

phrases: $3$ uses $count$ hashtags on an average

rules.example: How many times did melaniatrump use 20 hashtags

process.expression: SELECT hashtags_chart[$3$] AS count FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$2$' AND count='1000';

phrases: $2$ used $3$ hashtags, $count$ times

rules.example: Show me the hashtag frequency chart of melaniatrump

process.expression: SELECT hashtags_chart FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$3$' AND count='1000';

phrases: Here is the hashtags frequency chart

rules.example: How many tweets did melaniatrump write in English?

process.expression: SELECT languages[$3$] AS count FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$2$' AND count='1000';

phrases: $2$ posted $count$ tweets in $3$

rules.example: Show me the language analysis chart of melaniatrump

process.expression: SELECT languages FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$3$' AND count='1000';

phrases: Here is the language analysis chart

rules.example: Show me the sentiment analysis chart of melaniatrump

process.expression: SELECT sentiments FROM twitanalysis WHERE screen_name='$3$' AND count='1000';

phrases: Here is the sentiment analysis chart

rules.example: who tweeted recently about loklak
rules.comment: this is an example rule, use it as boilerplate for your own rules. Test this by calling http://localhost:4000/aggregation/chat.json?q=who%20tweeted%20recently%20about%20loklak

process.expression: SELECT screen_name FROM messages WHERE query='$1$';

phrases: The latest tweet about $1$ was from $screen_name$.
